paper_abstract: In this paper, we show that the proofs of Theorem 4 and Theorem 5 in "Randic spectral radius and Randio energy" by S.B. Bozkurt et al. [MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 64 (2010), 321-334] are not correct. We modify their result and give another upper bound for Randic energy. We also show that the proof of Theorem 4.1 in "On incidence energy of graphs" by K.C. Das et al. [Linear Algebra Appl. 446 (2014), 329- 344] is not correct.
paper_title: Note on Three Results on Randic Energy and Incidence Energy
